Trade/Device Name(s): ECHO TD-3227 Dual Blood Pressure/Blood Glucose Meter
TD-3227 Dual Blood Pressure/Blood Glucose Meter
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ECHO TD-3227 Dual Blood Pressure/Blood Glucose Meter
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Oscillometric, non-invasive pressure measurement for blood pressure
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ECHO TD-3227 Dual Blood Pressure/Blood Glucose Meter for quantitative glucose measurement and non-invasive blood pressure and pulse rate monitoring.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites for people with diabetes and for non-invasive measurement of systolic/diastolic blood pressure and pulse rate using a wrist cuff, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes, hypertension, or for neonates.
